columns.name: SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the ship unit associated with the shipment.

columns.name: INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID
columns.description: The involved party contact for the qualifier listed on the shipment.

columns.name: COM_METHOD_GID
columns.description: The communication ,method for the involved party listed on the shipment.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_LOCATION_NAME
columns.description: The location name that is to be used for this involved party on a shipment in place of (overridden) the one on the location table.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_CITY
columns.description: The location city that is to be used for this involved party on a shipment in place of (overridden) the one on the location table.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PROVINCE
columns.description: The location providence  that is to be used for this involved party on a shipment in place of (overridden) the one on the location table

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PROVINCE_CODE
columns.description: The location providence code that is to be used for this involved party on a shipment in place of (overridden) the one on the location table

columns.name: OVERRIDE_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: The location country code that is to be used for this involved party on a shipment in place of (overridden) the one on the location table

columns.name: OVERRIDE_POSTAL_CODE
columns.description: The location postal code that is to be used for this involved party on a shipment in place of (overridden) the one on the location table

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
